name: Italian Cheese Balls
author: MASSA21
summary: The cheese balls add a change to your pasta dinner.  This is a great recipe that I got from my father.  He made these while I was growing up and I loved them, now I want to share this with everyone.
directions: Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
In a medium bowl, mix together the ricotta cheese, cream cheese, flour, salt, vanilla, lemon zest and eggs
In a separate bowl, whisk together the egg whites and sugar
Pour into the cheese mixture, and mix until well blended
Roll into balls about the size of a golf ball, and place in a glass baking dish
Bake for 45 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown on top
